content: Really fun game, worth the money. Best played with a stylus.
Pretty good take on both games

Galaxy Note 9 on T-Mobile with Android 10. This game may no longer be supported by Square/Enix as it does not get beyond the loading screen. Too bad, this was a great game I played without issue for over 3 years.
Game is completely non functional and will not load as of late 2020.
superb modern take on old school nostalgia. taito are elite publishers in video games. i really like this. i wish there was an official port of arkanoid the best breakout game.
Loving it! Very challenging and no pay-to-win. This one's all about strategy (and a fair amount of luck!) and it's safe to say it's addictive.
Tbh, I love it. The difficulty in hard mode is sometime fair and somtime not, but normaly the lucky factor is necessary to clear the stage.
Used to work great, now constant crashing on title screen.
No longer loads on my phone and the company won't bother fixing the issue. Beware of buying any Android games from Square Enix. Any purchase will be more like a rental that could end at any time.
Fun. Lots of levels. Nostalgia vibes. Good stuff.
I know the game is a very good and well made game, but whenever I try booting it up, it just turns off my tablet.
A mash up of two classics that works brilliantly. Great for a quick blast or half an hour of solid play due to short varied levels. Worth every penny. No issues opening on a Pixel 3a.

Fantastic game when it works but more often than not it gets stuck on the loading screen when I try to play it, so I don't often try. Such a shame, it would be a five-star game otherwise, it really is great fun when you actually get to play it.
Oddly addictive, these two games mesh well together.
Pretty awesome Arkanoid and Space Invaders crossover game, thank you Sqaure Enix and Taito for making this game amazing and awesome.
Not working on p30 pro...game locks on loading screen. try and support taito by buying this but they need to support their own games. Won't buy any more until this fixed or they give me some advice!
Very good game. Well worth the $
Great until Lvl 69. We aren't all Bobby Fishers.

A phenomenal hybrid of two classics: Arkanoid and Space Invaders! The graphics are beautiful and really throw you into the game. The sound is perfect and very much gets you hyped up and wanting more! The gameplay is a match made in heaven, and is super responsive and tight. The game prepares you very well within the first 20 levels, it then starts to ramp up in difficulty, and I personally love that! The game is 100% worth every penny you pay! This game is a must have for any fan!
A mobile game worthy of being an actual game rather than a cash vacuum. Great meld of arkanoid and space invaders, appeals to the child in me as these were very big back then. Love it.
great game, no IAPs to drag down the grind.

I'm going to make a bold statement here, and say this is the best mobile game I have ever played. Absolutely fantastic. Uodate: Stopped working for me. Just loads endlessly. Uninstalled and reinstalled more than once. No updates Available. Fantastic game, but seriously frustrating to not be able to play a game you've paid good money for.
Great game with loads of challenging levels, worth the money.
Absolutely fun and awesome way to combine 2 of my all-time favs!! Way to go SQUARE-ENIX

I'm a huge fan of shooter games, and having a game that mixes both "Arkanoid", a brick breaking game, and "Space Invaders", a shooting game, it really makes the game feel unique and fun to play. Another side note to add is that this game features Sayo-chan from "KiKi KaiKai" as an unlockable. I played "Space Invaders '95" on the PS2, and Sayo-chan was always my favorite character to play, so seeing her here in this game makes me happy. This game is a little expensive, but is still worth playing.
Fantastic. The difficulty ramps up pretty quickly but it's hands down one of the best games I've ever played on a phone.
Simply fun for short bursts of playtime. Didn't encounter bugs or anything too annoying.
Hassle free. Awesome game. TAITO is the best.

This game is good and for the price too. The only issue is its more space invaders than arkonoid. I know all pilots have their special moves but it would not hurt if they gave some powers like arkonoid. The game is nice I think it could have used better music, some cut scenes anime style, difficulty level and different bosses then it would have been perfect.
very fun game. disappointed to not have an actual Arkanoid game on the Play Store, but this was a novel surprise.
Worth every penny. Full game full character u lock. no need to buy any dlc. a must have!
Addicting
very nice on my pixel
Awesome🤘

An excellent mashup of two classic arcade titles. The direct purchase model, rather than the scammy-as-hell "freemium" garbage is a breath of fresh air. The game is challenging enough to be engaging, but doesn't have to be over-the-top punishing to encourage you to buy buffs just to make progress (as there are zero microtransactions). The various "skill" characters adds a bit of depth to your strategy. Overall, an excellent title, well worth the purchase price.
This is a fun mashup of two classic games with levels that will make you think in order to win and a nice combination of modern gameplay refinement and nostalga.

Nice and fun game, bringing a fresh Arkanoid edition, with new gameplay. The combination with Space Invaders is clever, some powers are satisfying to use, character variety is good. Downsides are that the game is pretty easy (some stages will require several tries though), and most of the characters won't be used or needed so it's wasted content. There are also some bugs here and there but nothing truly important. Overall it's worth the money for the fun.
one of the best mobile games on the market.
Love it, miss the good ol' days.
Not work in full screen honor 8x
fab game, simple but fab.
Pretty fun. Although some levels are frustratingly tough. I will admit that it is addicting.
Great aesthetics and fun mechanics with a hint of strategy and puzzling to it too!
Great mashup of Arkanoid and Space Invaders. Absolutely worth the 5 dollars.
Interesante fusion de 2 juegos que me encantan! Muy entretenido y se pone mas retador con forme avanzas.
Excelent!
real fun game
Awesome just what I have been looking for! Get harder in the 70 not bad but just cant progress any farther now
Ilike seeing these older characters combined in a high energy game

Game is to hard but love the style. Price is to much for it, i paid full price and can say that is not worth it not even 75% of it. It should be much lower at the minimum possible. Also it lacks on Google Achievements, have only 4 of those and give 500points... that is nothing for a high level like mine 50+
I hate phone games, but this is amazing! A lot of effort was put into making this a legit fun experience!
Classic Taito action combining two of its iconic games. It's immensely fun to unlock all of the characters from all of the Taito titles and see them again in this game. Great fun!

The kind of game that gives you hope for mobile games again. 2 minute challenges that take full advantage of the premise, providing a gloriously insane action/puzzle mix that will have you going Just One More Round again and again and again... All with no stamina or life limit, no paid powerups, and indeed NO ADDITIONAL PURCHASES OR ADS WHATSOEVER. Almost no one who buys this game is going to regret it.
This is a SOLID game. It's a strange interpretation and mashup of two classics that works incredibly well.
Nostalgia x2
Just brilliant, and a brilliant idea

Whoever the heck decided this was a good idea is a genius. Headcanon: the 
Invaders used a marker from qix to create the stages.
Great classic arcade mix.
This was worth the money

You'd be hard-pressed to find another mobile game with this much content 
for this cheap.

This shows what "traditional mobile gaming" should be. It's a budget 
premium game and is worth. No schemes to nickel and dime you. Just pure 
fun. It has great visuals, feels really satisfying, and has the perfect 
amount of challenge. Lots of mobile games with potential are ruined by 
greedy business models. This isn't one of those games.

Excellent mash-up with gameplay that stands on it's own. There's plenty of 
arcade action, but as you progress through it gets a bit more puzzle like. 
You'll try to figure out the best way to deactivate the gold blocks or hit 
the cores. Picking the best helper character is also part of the strategy 
(and a treat for us arcade nerds).
Fabulous game.
Not the game that I thought it would be, but still ok I guess.
Awesome old school gameplay. Tricky puzzles as well mixed in.
No in app purchases or ads. You pay and you get a game.
Great game ... Just needs slightly better controls.
This is how a freemium game should be. I've never felt like I have to purchase something in order to make progress. Really fun game and a neat twist on both classics!

Great game, all killer no filler, no microtransactions just a straight forward you get what you pay for, awesome fresh take on the classic brick breaker genre, subverts your expectations of space Invaders as ur actually meant to hit bullets to ultimately unlock the brick breaker attack
A perfect combination of two classic games! The many levels are challenging and addictive!
Awesome game, combines two of the greatest classics and they fit so well together you would think they weren't seperate games.

A fantastic remix of two classics. Takes the core of what made us spend hours with simple addictive gameplay and expands upon it.   This makes for an fantastic mix of tricky puzzles, skill shots and luck.  Only thing I can nit pick say is the story mode is not really needed. But you can skip it.  Excellent game!
Amazing addictive game but twice now I have made it over level 150 and done the upgrade for the game which resets the whole game and have to start again from the beginning. Bollocks!
Love it, my two favorite games rolled into one great game! My only complaint is that I didn't find it sooner!
Love it
Fun game, good way to kill time on buses
Very fun Arkanoid style game with TONS of Taito character cameos and excellent music by ZUNTATA! 5 Stars and a must buy for anyone who loves old style arcade games!
Nice variety of supporting characters and challenging levels make this an app I will be keeping on my phone.
Best mobile game available, period.
Crashes randomly even after I close and all the apps. Also, why on earth would you have a button that's says "Try Again" and does virtually the same thing as the "Go to Map" button?
Awesome app would tell friend.
Love the game.  Please make original arkanoid, I'll pay for it.
A good arcade game, a good price, no add and no in-app purchases, it's to rare to ignore.
Very addictive
Upgrade erased all Google Play data. After hours of gameplay, I'm forced to start at the beginning. WHAT GIVES?
Nice game. :)
It's a good arkanoid game and great taito fanservice
Great game. Well worth a couple dollars. Fun. I don't think it uses any data at all after download.
Best for idea for a crossover

Only playing it for 30 minutes so far and I get the idea of what kind game this is. Well, it is obvious - Space Invaders with Araknoid elements. Great crossover and the presentation is one of the cleanest on mobile. Great pick up and play type of game or of you want to sit down and power through the levels, you can do that too without monetary limititations - just skill.  I could totally see this game being shipped for $30 on GBA or DS (surprised this concept didn't come out for DS, actually) but it is only $4. It is probably the best $4 you'll spend on a game like this.  Get it if you like Space Invaders and Araknoid. Or, if you just want a fun game with you all the time without the need of connecting to the internet or "signing in".
It's amazing, plain and simple.  If you're jaded towards iOS games, let this be a loud wake up call.
Please add controller support
An excellent blend of classic games
Two of my favorite retro games put into one. It's a blast.
I'd expect more from square , but definitely worthwhile
Yay !
awesome game except for the fact that it requires a cell/wifi connection to play.  why????  i already bought it!
I like this😃
Seriously. Buy it. No Internet needed beyond the until download. Full package in one purchase. Do it.
One of the best mobile games I've ever played.  Sometimes I slide over the home button on the fire 7 by accident, however.
I like the variety of levels and power ups. Good nostalgic game play from two classic games put together.
An excellent combination of two iconic game franchises. Just the right level of difficulty and plenty of replay value. Perfect for a 5min spin or a 30min stint.
I really appreciate games that let you pay once and access the full game. This is a great game!
The difficulty curve is ruthless, I seriously can't progress. It's nice while it's playable, but the time-trial gameplay and weird mechanics just take the fun out of classic Arkanoid brick-breakers.
Great crossover! Arcade gameplay with music by Zuntata.

userName: What Did I Get Myself Into
content: What a fun game. You get what you pay for and exactly what you expect. A great well rounded game with upgrades, characters,  and enough game evolution to keep you interested. No ads! No in game purchases! Probably my new favorite time killer. I definitely recommend trying. A completely different game you would expect from the makers of F2F. Well worth it.

Needs to be optimised for S8 and S8 Plus (full screen) as cannot see the sides. This game is a big contender got GAME OF THE YEAR 2017!!! It needs tweaked as regards getting progressively harder, the game suddenly gets super hard at times! Frustrating at times, an example would be level 69 is harder than many of the levels that follow it. Then you will get some challenging levels then easy ones then super hard ones, it needs to progress steadily. I recommend this game and look forward to the updates, this game is a winner with lots of content, don't get the anime aspect though!
Tedious
Great mash-up, and no free to play BS to get in the way of fun! Thanks Taito!
It's a great combination of two classics, and the references to other Taito games with the Pilots are a fun bonus.
Great game!

It was great until this morning. I opened the game to play. I was prompted to download additional data before I could play. I was halfway through hard mode. Now it looks like I lost all of my saved data. It's making me start from the beginning. Cleared dara uninstall/reinstall. Same thing. 💩 💩 What happened? This has happened several times. I have noticed after updating it doesn't login to google play games to get my progress, thus forcing me to start from the beginning. Grr
Amazung! Thanks!
Excellent mash up of two arcade classics. Very challenging levels but lots of fun. No adverts or IAP.
One of the best games on Android and it's not a F2P! No microtransactions, just rely on your skills. Well done Square Enix!
Great game lots of obscure characters
Really good value for purchase, best mobile game I've bought in a while.
Such a fun game!
I loved Arkanoid as a kid. Space Invaders not so much but this sure brings some nice changea to the table. Lots of nostalgia too!
cool game!

Taito have created a simply stunning mobile game. The game has a one of purchase price which is fairly low. As a result there is not a wait timer or energy bar that requires recharging via an in app purchase. This makes me very very happy. The gameplay is absolutely perfect for a mobile device. It mixes classic Arakanoid and space invaders gameplay styles which work so well together. The graphics are clean, bright and perfect for this style of game. Finally the controls work well for touchscreen controls. Al in all this is how module games should be done. I wholeheartedly recommended a purchase.

Not everyone enjoys anime type characters inserted into a classic game, even a "new" combination game like this.  Really wish there was an "old school" mode or something where I didn't have to deal with/listen to the annoying anime-ish characters 3x times or more per level.
It starts out fun .
An instant classic. An awesome game overflowing with nostalgic charm, it is perfected for mobile. Highly recommended.
Absolutely brilliant retro mash up... Keep up the good work. 😊
Superb game with a good learning curve. Worth every penny, or euro or dollar,...

A combination of two of my favourite games from yesteryear, I thought how can this work?, but wow they have pulled this off, it's very addictive and well worth 5 pounds of my money, great arcade game packed full of gameplay.
Mint game!
What is not to love! Two great classics anyone with a childhood has enjoyed. With a catalogue of recognisable characters each with unique abilities, this has more hooks than Ridiculous Fishing!
Buy it!! Don't hesitate! This is the way mobile games need to be! Such good value. no iaps, or ads just damn fine gameplay!
Enjoying the combination of two classics.
Absolutely beautiful game. Pumping music, nuanced mechanics, but very very simple. The hard-mode unlocked for stages really packs a wallop! Classic arcadey fun for everyone.

Great combination of Arkanoid and Space Invaders gameplay. Controls are smooth and customizable. Graphics are simple, charming,  and effective. Characters and items can all be purchased with points you earn in game, and the difficulty curve had been really satisfying so far. Highly recommended.

This game is incredible.  Space Invaders and the Arkanoid series were two of my favorite arcade games growing up, and this game combines both into one really simple yet really fun game.  Bouncing the Invader's shots back at them using the Vaus is incredibly fun, and using Attack Mode and all the different characters' special abilities adds even more variety.  The graphics look great, and the game runs smoothly even on my beat-up four year old phone running Android 4.4.  Best of all, the game is only four bucks, is completely free of in-app purchases and adds, and requires no invasive permissions to your device.  It is literally just a polished, fun little game that you can buy, play, and enjoy RIGHT NOW without all the BS that accompanies many "free" games.  If you've ever played Space Invaders or Arkanoid, spend the four bucks and buy this awesome little game.  You won't regret it.  I hope Square Enix and other developers/publishers continue releasing games like this in the future!
Fun story and great levels. Tight controls as well.
Amazing, just amazing! I never thought I'd pay £5 for a game on play but this is something else!!!
Great game and theres no in game ads or any in game purchases. I like the mix between arkanoid and space invaders.
Almost perfect, just implement Google play achievements!!
I really wish there were more games like this in the app store!
Hell YEAH!!!!!!! GREAT JOB!!!!

I agree with everyone who likes that this is a good, solid game with a single purchase price (more than reasonable for the sheer amount of content you get) and no in-app purchases. Taito has more than earned their purchase price with this game - do yourself a favor and support this developer.
Good game... But everytime i get near buttons in the bottom of my phone it goes to home or does whatever the button I hit does...
Excellent game! No microtransactions, pay for it once and get many hours of really great gameplay.
Great collaboration of two classics. squareenix had done it again, and also make a game where there's no in app purchases
Nostalgia mash up that works. Who'd a thunk it?
Good game, nice blend of two classics which works better than you may first think. I'll take a star off for not properly using Google Play Achievements.

1) no in app purchases GREAT 2) no microtransactions GREAT 3) premium game GREAT 4) one off price GREAT 5) original devs of these classic titles GREAT 6) fantastic gameplay GREAT  If you want to rid the world of the cancer that is freemium in games buy this game.  show the devs that count that this us what we want.
Great classic mashup. Perfect blend of both games. Worth every penny for no ads or in app purchases​!
Fun mash up between two classic games put together in a way not thought possible.  Totally worth the price for countless hours of fun and challenge.
The absolute last Arkanoid or Space Invaders game you'll ever need!

Gamers, put your money where you mouth is and buy this game!  It is rare to get a premium game with absolutely no in app purchases.  You get the game, and aren't constantly hit with pay walls.  We need to support well made games like this, or be doomed to experience energy systems and 9 different types of currency in every game.
A great twist on 2 classics combined into 1.
This game is fantastic! It's exactly what its title suggests it is, which should be enough if you're a fan of either series.

Played on a Galaxy Note 5 running 7.0 Nougat, works with S Pen🖋️so your finger doesn't block the action. 2 great games combined in to one to give you a taste of both. Square Enix did a great job creating a new game out of two older classic games. It also has Google Play Achievement XP points. If you're on the fence about getting this game, it's worth a serious look. I was hesitant at first, but now I'm glad I bought it!👍😎👉💯

A really enjoyable mobile game, employing none of the underhanded microtransactions other mobile games try to sneak in at every turn. Quick 2min games are possible or you can binge play for an hour if this fits your style. It's refreshing to play a game that is fun, without second guessing whether the difficulty has been stacked to make the purchase of virtual currency seem more appealing. It's a challenging game, but a challenge that can be overcome with your own skill (and a little luck at times)

AvSI's presentation is slick and, although the gameplay is simple on the surface, the game's difficulty ramps up to a satisfying level without ever feeling "cheap;" it doesn't subscribe to the manufactured difficulty that so many games seem to demonstrate.  You also don't get bombarded with the usual in-app microtransactions (there aren't any, in fact).  I don't often write reviews, but this game is high quality stuff.  Worth the money, plus it's family app compatible so I can install it on all my family's tablets and phones.
Not a bad game for the price
Loved it. 2 classic titles in one, bravo square enix.
Sublime! Premium! Buy it!
Really great app, easily one of the best games on Android. No IAPs, lots of content, great gameplay. Pure arcade bliss.

Difficulty curve is ridiculous. Gets way to hard way to fast to enjoy it. Stuck on a level in the second area that only requires you take out 3 waves for crying out loud. Otherwise aside from the frustration I like it.
Omg if you love classic games then get this remix it's addictive and very fun.
Played the first two levels and already addicted. Amazing.
Seems like a great game! The concept of combining two franchises like this works perfectly and the game is fun to play. Highly recommended!
Great mashup

Square Enix, I have always been frustrated that you never bring your Taito intellectual properties internationally ever since you integrated Eidos Interactive, but to see this give me joy to know that Taito is still alive. As you can see, there is still demand for Taito intellectual properties as proven by this game. Make more Taito games in this singular payment Square Enix. Thank you!
Great
Its a great idea for a game I like the characters in this game we love you taito and square enix
Lovely in every way, nowt else to say
Stylish and fun. Worth the money.

SOOOO much fun!! SE really nailed it with this one. It feels so good, like being back in the arcade glory days. Simple, tough to master, exciting art and sound, great characters. Even a fun story for what it is, really a champion for quality gaming. Thank you for this!

This works far better than I ever expected it to. The gameplay gets frantic really fast, just like classic Arkanoid. Attack mode is a nice addition, and there are a ton of levels. You can pick up and play pretty quickly.  Best of all? It's a no-BS experience. No ads, no IAP, doesn't even need to be online after the first time you run it. The game never nags you or makes you wait on some stupid timer. Got 2 minutes? You can do a level or two without any fuss.  Boy, do I appreciate that given the sad state of most other mobile games.
Great game
Perfect mix of difficulty and short gameplay sessions. Exactly what I am looking for in a mobile game! Refreshing to just buy and no IAP too.
Great stuff!
No ads, no microtransactions, great game, great company.
If this is where mobile gaming is headed, sign me up!  Lots of fun, great soundtrack, neat and colorful characters, and (best of all) NO IAP!!! Thanks for bringing back the Taito love, Square-Enix!

A brilliant game a brick breaker with space invaders you have a time limit for each level plus characters to collect as well achievements too a must get with one payment for game with no in app purchases get it now :-)
Amazing. Good pricing and no in app purchases. Gameplay is just what you should expect. I'm going to recommend this to all my friends.
Not compatible with Nvidia Shield TV or any other android TV :(

Absolutely fantastic! No hidden fees or anything. Buy the game once and that's it, there is nothing else you need to buy. You also don't need to be online to play. Just once for the first time to download the game data and that's it.   It's fun and a great nostalgic ride. Everyone should pick it up!

Surprisingly few permissions (Connecting to the internet the ONLY permission), seems to be playable offline (But it does download additional data on first boot, which I guess is the DRM for the game?), no iap (It's sad when you have to advertise that due to today's habits on using iap in many games), and plays well too. Good Job.

This is exactly what more game designers need to try to emulate -- a fun game, with Incredible graphics, music, and audio effects for a fair price, without a hint of IAP, ads, or even Internet connectivity requirements (after initial download).  Outstanding!
For a throw back I love it. Very nostalgic but with great graphics & good game play.

Finally maybe developers will start coming around.  High quality gaming, no IAP, no Ads - all at a fair price.  Great premise and execution.  Audio is fantastic - love the remixed songs!  I'd drop an extra buck or two to have isolated copies of that music.  Highly recommended.

Out of nowhere comes this little gem of a game! I am not a typical fan of mobile gaming but I am long time retro and Taito fan so I just had to give this a go.  No in app purchases garbage, no 'Smurfberries' to collect and even controller support?  I was more than thrilled to support this $4 purchase and out the door game.  Love it and highly recommend it as well.  Can we get the soundtrack too?  As always Taito keeps it going with great music to back the gameplay.  Keep it up!
